subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The promise of the team’s playoff run last season is beginning to fade, with goaltender Evgeni Nabokov and defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky out and two inexperienced goaltenders filling in.
snippet: The promise of the team’s playoff run last season is beginning to fade, with goaltender Evgeni Nabokov and defenseman Lubomir Visnovsky out and two inexperienced goaltenders filling in.
